document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.realm year: [[1371 DR]]<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/The Underground|2}}<ref group="note" name="date">In other sources it is stated that the founding of Ravens Deep and the death of Lord Blacktree both occurred in the year 1371 DR. Since Ravens Deep is stated in the adventure to exist, yet Lord Blacktree is still alive, it’s safe to conclude that the year must be 1371 DR.
